Important publication in Frontiers in Public Health describes development of culturally tailored interventions to address COVID-19 disparities!

Bill Cresko joins a collaborative team led by Jennifer Budd in documenting the development and design of interventions specifically tailored to address COVID-19 disparities among Oregon's Latinx communities, demonstrating the power of community-engaged research during public health emergencies.

## Community Partnership

The research demonstrates:
- Community-based participatory approaches
- Culturally responsive intervention design
- Trust building with marginalized communities
- Equitable research practices
- Social justice in science

## COVID-19 Disparities

The work addresses:
- Disproportionate pandemic impacts
- Healthcare access barriers
- Social determinants of health
- Structural inequalities
- Community resilience

Key components include:
- Culturally appropriate messaging
- Language accessibility

- Barrier reduction strategies
